thread.section_title: Intoxalock Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intoxalock | intoxalock.com | 11 of 218
thread.title: Jen W

author: Jen W
title: Jen W
text: Nicole was absolutely fantastic from the moment she picked up the phone. Despite my not having all my paperwork with me, she was patient and talked me through all the steps of what I needed to do, and called me the next day when she hadn't heard back from me. She has to be one of the best (if not the best) customer service reps I've ever spoken with. She made a very stressful situation calm and easy for me, and I can't thank her enough.
